website_summaries.verdict: 5 sturdy reusable bags in 3 sizes. The stand-up design takes a little effort to clean and dry, but makes up for these inconveniences with generous interior space.
pros: These bags offer an expandable stand-up design that holds an ample amount of food
Made of durable PEVA material that holds up well to repeated use
cons: Water tends to get trapped in the crevices, which makes these bags a bit challenging to dry

customer_reviews.title: The closure doesn’t work easily.
customer_reviews.text: We just started using these bags on a regular basis for some of our early garden produce. The closure is nearly impossible to secure. I’m very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the products is very good. Sealing is durable, after several use can still be fastened. It has a large capacity and can hold many things. Several models are very practical
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great for zero waste storage!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bags! They are great for zero waste ziploc bags! I do wish they were dishwasher safe though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: So nice to use. Luttle hard to close hyt otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Gooooood
customer_reviews.text: Put of my expectation, it is totally great. No plastic smells, and each bag is clean and in good quality. Also it only took one and half a day to be delivered. Ready for my next cooking step hahaha!
customer_reviews.author: Leyi

customer_reviews.title: Bags won't close anymore
customer_reviews.text: My bags no longer are usable because they won't close. I've only ever hand washed these items and air dry them. But for some reason after only three uses each they don't want to close. so I've honestly had to toss them and I was really excited to use these because I wanted to stop using gladbags and wasting plastic But I guess I'll try to go with another company.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but hard to seal
customer_reviews.text: The bags themselves are excellent and I love the concept. However, they don't seal easily. I usually have to use a clip or something hard to get the tracks to line up and seal.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great, can be difficult to seal at times, buttjey are great! I love all the sizes
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy Tiblue reusable bags.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful. Most bags I cannot even get to seal at all. I used a couple of them once but then ended up pitching them all. So much for being eco-friendly. Definitely do not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Todd M. Baranek

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them yet but they look pretty good
customer_reviews.author: beverly

customer_reviews.title: do NOT buy it !
customer_reviews.text: The bags don't open all the way so the mouth of the bag is quite small. After few usage I wasn't able to close it anymore. How is that even possible ? And ... the cherry on top, when I went to add the review I got "product doesn't exist" although is the exactly same set from the exactly same seller. My only thinking is that they remove the product to eliminate negative reviews and they re-add it with the same description for a "fresh" start. @amazon can and should do a better job filtering out these type of sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to close, skip this brand.
customer_reviews.text: These should be amazing but there are two huge issues: 1. They are impossible to close! My thumbs still hurt from trying to push the closure together against the counter. I usually give up and just use these bags for grapes. The closure on these bags is garbage. 2. They don’t open all the way! The sides of the closures are manufactured closed so these don’t open all the way. So difficult to get those grapes in there if they’re still in a bunch. I truly dislike these bags and do NOT recommend. I wish I could send them back and get a decent product. Seriously, these don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Zip doesn’t line up for bag closure! Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great and seems of good quality material. But after 1 use for some reason the ziplock closure doesn’t line up. It was gently used and hand washed with warm water & soap. I am pretty OCD and am very good a lining things up that are normally difficult. Not only can my husband not close these at all but now I can’t zip/slide them shut either. I’m super bummed about this product.
customer_reviews.author: AJM

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these but after months of owning them and trying to use them, I absolutely hate them. They are nearly impossible to close. If you can't close them, they are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S.

customer_reviews.title: Zippers don’t seal
customer_reviews.text: I only hand-wash. One zipper never worked. Now with two washes, another zipper died. Not worth it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: These won't zip closed. I think the part that is suppose to zip is too thick.
customer_reviews.author: virgomoon

customer_reviews.title: Holy But Not Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: First use discovered hole in the bottom= spoiled food, not a good experience
customer_reviews.author: mcsetsr

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Was able to use each bag twice before the closure stopped working. Kind of pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Alli P

product_meta.title: Reusable Storage Bags - 5 Pack STAND-UP BPA FREE Freezer Bags (2 Reusable Sandwich Bag + 2 Reusable Snack Bag + 1 Reusable Lunch Bag) - Leakproof Silicone and Plastic Free Ziplock Bag for Food Storage
product_meta.description:
Everyone on Earth should understand the issue and have the chance to make informed choices.

According to relevant scientific reports, humans have produced 18.2 trillion pounds (about 8.26 billion tons) of plastics,
meaning that human-made plastic waste can exist for hundreds or even thousands of years. 
In our environment, there is almost no place without plastic waste, including the ocean.

Tiblue mission is reducing the use of disposable plastic bag, provide people with safe, convenient,
Reusable PEVA food storage bags, would you like to join in us?

Features
Healthy and safe 
Tiblue reusable storage bags are made of food-grade PEVA material, BPA FREE, great for packing your kids or your family lunches. 
Stand-Up design
With the expandable base, the reusable food storage bags are easier and more convenient to fill, clean and organize. 
Transparent design
Transparent design allows for a quick glance at contents inside. Nest and Compress Flat convenient to storage. 
Save you money
Reduce clutter and waste with these reusable storage bags. One Tiblue reusable bags can be replace 350+ disposable plastic bag. 
Widely use
perfect size for fruit, vegetable, snacks, sandwiches, kids lunch, travel, make-up, home organization and more. 
Saver seal
Air tight zip design make snack bag more leakproof that can keep food FRESH for longer. 

Package Includes: 
1 x Stand-up half of gallon bags(10" x 7.2" x 2")
2 x Stand-up Reusable Sandwich Bag(8" x 5.7" x 2")
2 x Stand-up Reusable Snack Bag(6" x 4.1" x 2") 

Choose Tiblue reusable storage bags, save you money and save the earth.
feature_bullets: FOOD GRADE MATERIAL: These reusable food storage bags are made of food-grade PEVA material, BPA FREE, environmentally friendly, healthy and safe for your family. One Tiblue reusable bags can save up to 350 + disposable bags.

LEAK-PROOF & STAND-UP DESIGN: With the expandable base, the reusable sandwich bags for kids are easier and more convenient to fill, clean and organize. Transparent design allows for a quick glance at contents inside. Nest and Compress Flat convenient to storage. Upgrade Closure make the reusable snack bags more sealed, airtight, leak-proof, waterproof, the reusable freezer bags can lock out freezer burn while keeping food fresh and full of taste, perfect for storing and preserving food.

REUSABLE & DURABLE: The reusable sandwich bag has been thickened and can be reused hundreds of times, making it the perfect solution for reducing the waste of plastic bags. Since the dishwasher will damage the zipper of the food storage bags, we recommend hand wash. No microwave, oven and dishwasher safe.

MULTI-PURPOSE: The size of this large lunch bag is 10" x 7.2" x 2", sandwich bag is 8" x 5.7" x 2", snack bag is 6" x 4.1" x 2", these storage bags are the perfect container for snacks, lunch, vegetables, fruit, food, baby food, cosmetics, jewelry make-up, stationery, travel and more.

100% CUSTOMER SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Choose Tiblue reusable lunch bags to reduce the use plastic bags and minimize your impact on the planet. If you are not 100% satisfied with your order, feel free to contact us for solutions.
